MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the L39 & WA11 postcode areas of Ormskirk & St Helens, affecting properties in Dairy Farm Road, Coach Road and surrounding streets. It will be  necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9PM due to a damaged overhead line. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 11PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:23PM on 1st April 2021
